All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class ProcessOutputThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Thread for reading the output of a process spawned by Runtime.exec.

Field Summary
private  boolean display
          If true, all output from the process is displayed to the standard output.
private  java.lang.Process proc
          Process to get the output from

Field Detail

proc

private java.lang.Process proc
Process to get the output from

display

private boolean display
If true, all output from the process is displayed to the standard output. If false, output is ignored.

                           boolean d)
Parameters:
p - Value for proc
d - Value for display
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Reads lines output by the proc. Displays them to the standard output if and only if display is true.
